overview:
Dean Dornic grew up in Monongahela, PA. He is Married to Pamela Dornic with three children, Matthew, Jevin and Elyssa.

Professionally Dean Dornic is an Ophthalmologist with offices in Cary and Smithfield, NC.

Dr. Dean Dornic enjoys swimming, biking, tennis, travel and rooting for the Pittsburgh Steelers.

He is a member of the American Academy of Ophthalmology, The American Medical Association, The American Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgeons and St. Michaelâ€™s Catholic Church.

In addition Dr. Dean Dornic is a member of the charity projects Research to Prevent Blindness, Project Access and Eyecare America.
